page.title: 05BREDON'S NORTON VILLAGE
page.content: {Bredon's Norton}is a small village on the side of{Bredon Hill}but it has grown in the last 60 years.{The Manor {House}is very old.This year it cele- brated its 400th anniversary and we did{Maypole Dances}at their celebrat- ions.The Post Office has shut down but it has re-opened in a shed near the {Church.}Now the Post Office only opens in the afternoon.The church is{Norman. We walked around the village.There are a few thatched houses but not many.The Village Hall used to be a school.It is like our school only it is much, much smaller.It has a Bell Tower like ours and it had some writing over the door. It says 'As the twig is bent so the tree inclines.'It means that if the teacher is kind to you you grow up to be kind to other people.We enjoyed our walk around the village, there are some very nice houses in it.
